name: Custom Textboxes
description: Display custom popups, chests, and more

key_popup.name: Popup keybind
key_popup.description:
Press this key to spawn the popup defined in <cy>custom_popups.json</c>

<cg>Shift + this key</c> will queue the popup
<cg>Alt + this key</c> will spawn the secondary one.

key_dialogue.name: Dialogue keybind
key_dialogue.description:
Press this key to spawn the dialogue box defined in <cy>custom_dialogues.json</c>

<cg>Shift + this key</c> will queue the dialogue
<cg>Alt + this key</c> will spawn the secondary one.

key_chest.name: Chest keybind
key_chest.description:
Press this key to spawn the chest defined in <cy>custom_chests.json</c>

<cg>Shift + this key</c> will queue the chest
<cg>Alt + this key</c> will spawn the secondary one.

missingIDWarn.name: Warn when missing ID
missingIDWarn.description: Displays a warning popup when trying to spawn a textbox with an ID that hasn't been defined

shiftSound.name: Queue sound effect
shiftSound.description: Plays a sound effect when a textbox is successfully queued up (by holding SHIFT)
